meta_text: ("PA'I GAD RGYANGS 'CHI BDAG G-YUL LAS RGYAL BA'I RNGA DBYANGS_’Laughing Out Loud in the Face of Those Who Would Frighten Us, a Drumbeat of Victory in the Battle against the Lord of Death,’ being a Supplication to the Root and Lineage Lamas of the Secret Teachings of the Conqueror, the Great and Glorious Frightener (Bhairava), along with the Angels of His Secret World, in order to End All Obstacles to the Long Life of that Absolute Lord of an Entire Ocean of Secret Worlds, Takdrak Dorje Chang_SKYABS RJE PHA BONG KHA PA BDE CHEN SNYING PO (1878-1941)", 'rtf')
